long-wearing!</div>\n<div>\n\t&nbsp;</div>\n<div>\n\t<u>DIRECTIONS</u></div>\n<div>\n\tBlend well all over eyelid, allow to set for 30 seconds, and then apply shadow.&nbsp;</div>\n<div>\n\t&nbsp;</div>\n<div>\n\t<strong>Tip:</strong> &nbsp;Lipliner helps extend the wear &amp; keeps your lipstick from feathering. &nbsp;When choosing a lipliner shade, match the lipliner to your lipstick shade or match your lipliner to the shade of your lips which will work with all your lipstick shades. &nbsp;Create a custom lipcolor by using a contrasting lipliner and lipstick shade. &nbsp;Before applying your lipliner, pat your lips lightly with your foundation or pressed powder puff, which also helps keep you lipstick from feathering.</div>\n<div>\n\t&nbsp;</div>\n<div>\n\t<u>INGREDIENTS</u></div>\n<div>\n\tIsododecane, &nbsp;Talc, &nbsp;Cyclopentasiloxane, &nbsp;Disteardimonium Hectorite, &nbsp;Trimethylsiloxysilicate, The silky smooth formula glides effortlessly onto the skin for long-lasting color.<br>\n\t<br>\n\t<u>DIRECTIONS</u><br>\n\tApply the base color all over the eyelid up to the browbone. Follow by sweeping on the lid shade all over the eyelid to shade. Next apply the crease color in the crease of the eye where the lid meets the browbone to contour. Finish by adding the line color around the lash line and outer corner of the eye to define and blend in edges.<br>\n\t<br>\n\t<u>INGREDIENTS</u><br>\n\tTalc, Mica, Magnesium Stearate, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Dimethicone, Polyisobutene, PVM/MA Decadiene Crosspolymer. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Mica (CI 77019), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Tin Oxide (CI 77861), Yellow No.5 Lake (CI 19140), Red No.40 Lake (CI 16035), Blue No.1 Lake (CI 42090)&nbsp;</p>\n\n    [reviews] => text_reviews\n    [href] => http://beautyjoint.com/ef21620-e-l-f-essential-flawless-eyeshadow/\n)\n</pre></span>-->\n\t\t<div class=\"price\"
